name: $serviceName
yaml:
service:
  name: $serviceName
  identifier: $serviceName
  tags: {}
  serviceDefinition:
    spec:
      manifests:
        - manifest:
            identifier: manifest
            type: K8sManifest
            spec:
              store:
                type: Git
                spec:
                  connectorRef: $gitConnId
                  gitFetchType: Branch
                  paths:
                    - ng-automation/k8s/templates-pl/
                  branch: $branch
              skipResourceVersioning: false
              enableDeclarativeRollback: false
        - manifest:
            identifier: values
            type: Values
            spec:
              store:
                type: Git
                spec:
                  connectorRef: $gitConnId
                  gitFetchType: Branch
                  paths:
                    - ng-automation/k8s/values.yaml
                  branch: $branch
      artifacts:
        primary:
          primaryArtifactRef: <+input>
          sources:
            - spec:
                connectorRef: $dockerConnId
                imagePath: harness/todolist-sample
                tag: latest
              identifier: artifact
              type: DockerRegistry
    type: Kubernetes
